targets.rawSql: SELECT "endOfYearPopulationPredicted" AS "Population by the end of the year" FROM "Population"

columns.alias: "Population by the end of the year"

panels.title: Population by The End of The Year
Population Growth by The End of The Year

targets.rawSql: SELECT "currentCo2Emissions" as "CO₂ Emissions", "currentCo2EmissionsPredicted" as "Current CO₂ Emissions (Predicted)", "populationGrowthThisYear" as "Population Growth This Year" FROM "AnnualCo2Emissions"

panels.title: Predicted Annual CO₂ Emissions This Year

targets.rawSql: SELECT "totalCo2EmissionsPredicted"/10^9 AS "Total CO₂ emissions (Gigatons)", "population" AS "Population" FROM "TotalCo2Emissions"

panels.title: Predicted Total CO₂ Emitted by The End of This Year
